A little background to how I got to this point...

My name is Drew Anthuny and I'm a singer/songwriter/producer from Los Angeles, California. Two years ago I released my very first demo to the world. Four months ago, a great opportunity worked itself through the universe that landed my song ""You Don't Need"" on a web series called ""First."" Since then the song has caught traction and has become a favorable tune to many. The greatest feedback I have gotten from my music was, ""You made me believe in love again."" And since then that has always been my goal.
<span style=""font-size: 24px
column5: >They say beauty is in the eyes of the beholder, that's what I see in you.

column1:
In a world filled with high expectations and the need to be perfect, the idea behind this video tells a story of a woman who struggles to live up to Hollywood or even the worlds standards of beauty. This film will show the hardship a couple goes through when a man fights to hold his woman down and reassure her that she is beautiful just the way she is.
This song is a reassurance that it doesn't matter what or how you look. Someone who loves you for who you are sees the true beauty that the world doesn't see in their eyes.

Want to help make this video possible? Here is how:

My mother always told me if you are going to do something you do it right. Filmmaking is an expensive craft. And the goal is to do it right. The money raised will go towards production and expenses that include:
● PRODUCTION: Camera, lenses, mic, lights, media cards, ect.
● POST PRODUCTION: Editing, music, graphics, ect.
Your contribution of any size would mean you gave a helping hand and played a part in making this project possible. Each donation will be a seed planted in promising soil and will be greatly appreciated and also duly acknowledged. 
Anything and everything helps.

Word of mouth.

Feel free to help spread the word. If you cannot donate, I would appreciate if you could give this campaign a boost by sharing this link with friends and family on social media like twitter and Facebook.
You can stay up-to-date of the progress and process of this project, follow me on twitter @drewanthuny or check out my Instagram at drew_anthuny.
You can also check out and download my music on my sound cloud: www.soundcloud.com/drew-anthuny

Howdy Y'all
My name is Walker
Pickens, and I am a singer-songwriter! I've spent my entire life in Central
Texas-- I grew up in a small town by the name of Wimberley (still near-and-dear
to my heart), and have spent the last six years living in Austin. Many of you
might be familiar with my music via my rowdy rock'n'roll band Mini Pony, but on
the side I've been nurturing a little crop of homespun, relatable folk songs,
inspired by the faces and places of my aforementioned hometown. You want a song
about football? I've got one of those. Small-town emergency management and
disaster response? Check. A little bit of heartbreak? You betcha. It's finally
time to dress these songs up real purty and send 'em out into the real world.
In mid-March, I'll be
going into Jumping Dog Studio with producer Pat Brooks and sound engineer Ron
Flynt to record my debut. I've miraculously managed to save up a significant
chunk of the money I need to do this, but at the end of the day I'm still a
broke musician working six days a week and putting myself through school. In
short, I really need your help!

What We Need:

Every cent I raise will go towards the production, pressing, and promotion of
this record. You needn't worry about me using it for illegitimate purposes and
carousing it all away-- I'm in a rock'n'roll band, remember? I get free drinks
already. Here's a rough breakdown of what we need the money for:
<li>Tracking and Mixing:
• Mastering: $500
<li>Professional Musicians
(bass, drums, cello, fiddle, steel, electric, and harmonies): $2000
<li>Manufacturing of CD's:

If I exceed the goal, the extra money will go toward producing more CDs and touring behind the album!

Why contribute?

I remember listening to my dad play John Prine songs on the guitar when I was kid and thinking, ""Man, I hope someday I can write music that resonates with people like that."" I might not have said it so articulately (since I was a child after all), but the point is that I've wanted to be a singer-songwriter for just about as long as I can remember. This is the first step of many in making that lifelong dream a reality! It's the biggest and most important project I've undertaken in my 23 years, and the fact of the matter is I won't be able to pull it off without y'all.

Oh, and if the emotional angle didn't work on you, you also get some cool stuff if you donate! Such as:

-a private house show anywhere in the continental U.S.
-a starring role in a music video
-a permanent spot on the guest list for all future Walker Pickens and Mini Pony shows
-an invitation to an exclusive advance listening party/barbecue
-a cameo in a music video
-a personalized haiku (5-7-5, right?)
-a signed physical copy of the album (whatever that's worth)
-a digital download of the album
-a digital download of the album single + unreleased album demos


Other ways you can help:

If you are unable to donate, don't worry! You can still help by sharing this campaign page with all your friends and getting the word out. Y'all are all beautiful. Thank you in advance for whatever support you're able to lend!

My Story
column13: I was hit by a car while walking across the street and left for dead (hit &amp
column14: run). Though I sustained countless injuries, I was lucky enough to survive, however I fell into a deep state of depression. Soon thereafter, I was diagnosed with Premature Ovarian Failure (POF) and informed that I have a 0-5% change of naturally conceiving. Life, as I knew it, was over for me.
column15:
>

In the past few years, I've been on a journey of self-love and self-discovery. Though I've accomplilshed many amazing things in the past seven years - including losing over 50lbs, placing 2nd in my first bikini compeition and living in St. Lucia for two years - I've yet to really figure out my purpose in this world - where do I ""fit in""? I feel that taking a this journey to Kenya to volunteer in an orphanage, might be the eye-opening experience I've been searching for. In my mind, maybe being around children with no mother, will help me redefine what it means to BE a mother...

My Journey to Kenya

My plan is to volunteer in Kenya for a minimum of 2-3 weeks through an organization called Projects Abroad, however the costs are quite high. To spend 2-weeks volunteering at an orphanage, the cost is $2,490 CDN, plus the cost of flight will run me for approximately $1,500 - $2,000 CDN. After paying for a VISA, ensuring I have spending money and paying approximately $4,500 CDN on the formerly mentioned expenses, I expect the trip will run me close to $5,000 CDN. Though I'd love to be able to fund this alone, It is just far too expensive for me at this time - especially given that I just moved back from St. Lucia where my expenses with very high and my income was in Eastern Caribbean Dollars. 

What I Need &
column16:
What You Get

  • I need approximately $5,000 CDN (breakdown above in 'My Journey to Kenya' section), however my goal is to raise $2,500 CDN in order to at least cover the volunteer costs.
  • The volunteer cost from Project Abroad includes accommodation, food, airport pick up and drop off, travel insurance, medical insurance, in-country induction with a staff member upon arrival, support and 24 hour back-up from staff, pre-departure support from Desk Officer by email and phone and visa application support. 
  • The funds will go to Project Abroad and towards my plane ticket (if I raise enough)
  • In exchange for your contributions, I'm offering a few perks (see right) that include photos from my trip, journal/blog entries from my trip and access to my E-Book on Shedding Body Fat Through Dietary Modifications, which includes information on how I shed over 50lbs of body fat. 

The Impact

Not only will your contribution assist me in my personal journey to figure out my purpose in life - especially as an infertile 25-year-old - but it will also help me help some of the 700 children who are orphaned every day in Kenya - that's a child every two minutes! There, I may be doing some or all of the following:
column21: font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Verdana, Tahoma, sans-serif

  • Feeding and bathing babies and toddles

>
  • Playing games with the younger children
column54: font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Verdana, Tahoma, sans-serif !important
column60:
>
  • Providing emotional support for the kids (most are hungry for attention)
column63: font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Verdana, Tahoma, sans-serif !important
column69:
>
  • Providing educational assistance 

    • For more information on the project I'm looking to volunteer for, please click here.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    I understand that not everyone can contribute, but if you can, I'd love it if you can give me a hand in making some noise about my fundraising campaign. You can help by using the Indiegogo share tools! Thank you so much!

    More About Kristen Adamson
column79: >
column85: >Since having experience the things I have, I've decided to try my best to spread the word about living life to the fullest! In addition, I'm trying to help other people understand that in the face of adversity, you can overcome ( it is possible!)! One of the ways I've chosen to do that is to teach other people about the importance of health and fitness on my website and on my Facebook page - please follow along!

column2: >Help launch Ensemble Échappé's inaugural season!

column1: Based in New York City, Ensemble Échappé (EÉ) is a versatile group of soloists dedicated to presenting an eclectic spectrum of 20th and 21st century music. Undefined by genre or style, EÉ is a sinfonietta that consists of 17 core members who are distinguished not only as exceptional instrumentalists, but as visionaries, sculpting the future of new music. Conducted by new music champion, conductor Jeffrey Milarsky, the musicians of EÉ are bound together by their desire to explore diverse sonic palettes.  EÉ is promoting a dialogue between performers and living composers, while also showcasing the masterworks of the American and European canons.

Co-Artistic Directors Nina C. Young and Jocelin Pan founded Ensemble Échappé to cultivate virtuosity in the contemporary concert experience and to present sinfonietta repertoire at the highest professional level.  The musicians are not only collaborators, but also rotate as solo artists highlighted through spotlight concerti with new works supported by our commissioning program.  The performers and composers of EÉ have a shared history together as alumni of The Juilliard School, as fellows of the Tanglewood Music Center, and through collaborations in NYC.


And what exactly is a sinfonietta?

We are larger than a chamber group and smaller than a full symphony.  A sinfonietta is a mini orchestra with one instrumentalist per part.  We have 17 phenomenal soloists, each with an individual musical line.
<div>
In our inaugural season, Ensemble Échappé is featuring two all-American programs.  We need your help to bring these concerts to life!

It is our desire to not merely give these works another hearing, but to cultivate the ensemble’s relationship with these inventive musical minds. We will approach each composition with a more intimate knowledge of the composer’s individual language, a luxury that allows for elevated interpretation of the repertoire.
What makes Ensemble Échappé
unique?  We are 17 virtuosic musicians
banning together to perform exclusively large ensemble, sinfonietta repertoire
at the highest professional level.  We
each want to showcase our solo talents with specially commissioned
concerti.  We are launching this effort
during our 2016-17 season.  EÉ is first

opener.  Our next spotlight will be in
the spring of 2017.  EÉ will feature

How can you help?

We really appreciate your support!

Contributions to The Field earmarked for Ensemble Échappé  are tax-deductible to the extent allowed by law. ","Help launch Ensemble Échappé's inaugural season!

Based in New York City, Ensemble Échappé (EÉ) is a versatile group of soloists dedicated to presenting an eclectic spectrum of 20th and 21st century music.  Undefined by genre or style, EÉ is a sinfonietta that consists of 17 core members who are distinguished not only as exceptional instrumentalists, but as visionaries, sculpting the future of new music. Conducted by new music champion, conductor Jeffrey Milarsky, the musicians of EÉ are bound together by their desire to explore diverse sonic palettes.  EÉ is promoting a dialogue between performers and living composers, while also showcasing the masterworks of the American and European canons.

Co-Artistic Directors Nina C. Young and Jocelin Pan founded Ensemble Échappé to cultivate virtuosity in the contemporary concert experience and to present sinfonietta repertoire at the highest professional level.  The musicians are not only collaborators, but also rotate as solo artists highlighted through spotlight concerti with new works supported by our commissioning program.  The performers and composers of EÉ have a shared history together as alumni of The Juilliard School, as fellows of the Tanglewood Music Center, and through collaborations in NYC.And what exactly is a sinfonietta?We are larger than a chamber group and smaller than a full symphony.  A sinfonietta is a mini orchestra with one instrumentalist per part.  We have 17 phenomenal soloists, each with an individual musical line.
In our inaugural season, Ensemble Échappé is featuring two all-American programs.  We need your help to bring these concerts to life!

On Monday, November 16, 2015 join us at Saint Peter's Church with Lex54 Concerts for a program of chamber music by composers Andy Akiho, Derek Bermel, Elliott Carter, David Fulmer, David Ludwig, and Young.  Catch a preview of our sinfonietta in full force with our closing piece: Sean Shepherd's These Particular Circumstances.

Join us for EÉ Unleashed on Thursday, February 25, 2016 at Symphony Space.  Jeffrey Milarsky will conduct our full sinfonietta performing music by Elliott Carter, David Hertzberg, Andrew, Norman, Julia Wolfe, and Charles Wuorinen.

All of the involved composers, while stylistically diverse, have worked with all or some of the musicians of Ensemble Échappé. It is our desire to not merely give these works another hearing, but to cultivate the ensemble’s relationship with these inventive musical minds. We will approach each composition with a more intimate knowledge of the composer’s individual language, a luxury that allows for elevated interpretation of the repertoire.
Commissioning Initiative
What makes Ensemble Échappé
unique?  We are 17 virtuosic musicians
banning together to perform exclusively large ensemble, sinfonietta repertoire
at the highest professional level.  We
each want to showcase our solo talents with specially commissioned
concerti.  We are launching this effort
during our 2016-17 season.  EÉ is first
commissioning Doug and Brad Balliett to write a bassoon-double
bass duo concerto for themselves, The Brothers Balliett,to be premiered during our 2016 season
opener.  Our next spotlight will be in
the spring of 2017.  EÉ will feature
violist Jocelin Pan with a newly
commissioned work by Nina C. Young and
pianist Conor Hannick with a new
concerto by Jonathan Dawe.
How can you help?

We are asking you to join us and to help make our first season a success.  Donate or sponsor a musician through this campaign, come to our events,  and be at the forefront of building an American sinfonietta.   EÉ will have a lasting impact on the cultural scene in New York City, in the United States, and around the world.

By donating to this campaign, your tax-deductible contributions will go directly towards the costs of producing our concerts: musician fees, venue rental, rehearsal space, marketing and publicity, audio-video recording, and music rental.  We are using IndieGoGo to get us closer to an overall operating budget of $45,000.
We really appreciate your support!  For more details, check out our website.
Join us on social media: Facebook and Twitter

As
young artists and warriors of peace, we express love and empowerment to
transform the World around Us.<span>  Through music,
we are able to reach all that have an ear and heart to listen.
We
have been blessed to be a part of many community events around the Bay
Area.<span>  From rally’s to open mics, we have
traveled to bring our light that is in tune to the spirit of the people.  Seeing hands raised and eyes bright, confirm
we are on our path of activating hearts with every note we hit and beat we bring.
We
blasted love deep from our souls one night, actually blowing out our one and
only PA system!<span>  Right now, we are calling
on you to help us replace it with a bigger and better system so we may continue

actively performing.

Make sure to stay connected with us via our facebook and twitter pages.  We encourage our supporters and loved ones to come experience a live

performance.  This revolution may be televised but its even better to come see and feel it for yourself!

All
help is greatly appreciated for us to reach our goal of raising $1300.<span>  It’s not easy to achieve alone, but with
collective support, we can continue to manifest this mission we have been led
to take – bringing love and light.

>MIRA NUESTROS VÍDEOS CON SUBTÍTULOS EN ESPA?OL! GRACIAS!

column1: Volám sa Julián Ratica a hudba ma naplno opantala, ke? som si v pätnástich zlomil nohu. Rok som nemohol chodi?, po?úval som staré jazzové platne a nau?il sa hra? na otcovej starej gitare. Dovtedy som hrával iba na klavíri a rozbiehala sa mi s?ubná kariéra v stredoškolskej kapele. Žia?, nahrávky sa už nezachovali :) Ke? som  rozchodil tú nohu, sadol som si za bicie. Bicie a perkusie mi u?arovali nato?ko, že ovplynili aj štýl môjho hrania na ostatné nástroje. Aby bola moja “ONE MAN BAND” kompletná, tak som sa ešte dou?il hra? na basu. Postupne som vystriedal viaceré kapely..až som zakotvil v manželstve. Teraz hrávam hlavne doma de?om a manželke, ale predsa len ob?as aj ""naozajstne"" koncertujem s mojou srdcovou kapelou COSMIC DAYS.
AKO TO VŠETKO ZA?ALO

Nikdy som nemal predstavu, že sa stanem detským pesni?károm. Vlastne by bolo vhodné poveda?, že by to ani nemali by? výhradne typické detské pesni?ky. Je to hudba, ktorú robím rád a zo srdca :) Pre všetkých.

Moje dve deti mi ob?as poži?ajú svoju detskú gitarku. No a práve pri takejto domácej jam session to celé za?alo - len tak si brnkám , a Tadeáško (9r.) mi hovorí: “mám text!” a už spieva..ide a nezastaví sa :) Tak vznikla naša prvá spolo?ná pesni?ka Pánko. Zrazu tu bola a ani neviem ako. Hne? na druhý de? som ju šiel nahra?. Nevedel som tú melódiu pusti? z hlavy, tak som ju musel vypusti? von. Moji domáci fanúšikovia boli nadšení a nevedeli sa do?ka? ?alšej pesni?ky. Tentokrát na podnet mladšieho Joachymka (3r.) vznikol Kominár. Tiež mi tento motív nedal pokoj, nahral som ho za jednu noc. No a odvtedy sa pesni?ky už len rodili a množili. Za?al som teda rozmýš?a? ako uchopi? tento „projekt“. Hudbu do týchto piesní som skladal ako pre dospelé publikum, tak mi napadlo, že by som mohol využi? konkrétne piesne ako ukážky rôznych hudobných žánrov a vnies? do projektu iný rozmer. Mojich domácich posluchá?ov nikdy nezaujímali detské odrhova?ky a už vôbec nie pou?né texty detských piesní. Nechcem podce?ova? vkus detí a týmto by som rád prispel k rozšíreniu ich hudobných obzorov. Na albume nájdete ukážky swingu, punku, reagge, bosanovy ale aj skladby inšpirované orientálnymi vplyvmi…
Na textoch piesní sa podie?ali aj moje deti, sú bu? vymyslené, alebo reflektujú skuto?né udalosti z našej domácnosti.:)  Niektoré texty sú prevzaté z detských ?udových piesní. .
Štúdio  NÁHODA NEEXISTUJE

Moja manželka je samé prekvapenie…a tak mi raz ve?er oznámila, že budúci víkend to?íme klip k Pánkovi. Je pravda, že sme sa ob?as pri pohári vína rozprávali, že by sa k tejto pesni?ke hodil animovaný klip…ale bral som to iba ako našu fantáziu. Zrazu sa to ale malo udia? a ja som mal by? hlavný protagonista.

No, ale aby som šiel po poriadku. Moja manželka - Didi - sa totiž v meste náhodou po rokoch stretla so svojim spolužiakom Mišom zo  strednej školy, ktorý je dnes kameramanom a žije v Madride. Rozmýš?ali o tom, že by mali využi? 2 týždne, kým sa zas Michal vráti spä? do Madridu a nie?o spolu vytvori?..tak Didi navrhla urobi? klip k pesni?ke Pánko. Didi je maskérka, a tak si myslím, že sa hlavne tešila ako ma zma?uje :).

Tak sme si spolu sadli a za?ali vymýš?ali scénar ku klipu - to, že bude animovaný bolo isté - potrebovali sme zakry? moje herecké nedostatky :). Okrem kameramana nikto z nás nemal skúsenosti s animáciou, ale to nikoho netrápilo. Takže ?ím skôr si album objednáte, tým skôr bude hotový!  A samozejme, že dostanete za váš príspevok parádne veci, exkluzívne výrobky (ru?ne robené) a k mojej hudbe sa dostanete medzi prvými!

Tiež nám záleží aby celý vizuál albumu, plagátov a  ilustrácii bol kvalitný a jednotný, preto ?alšie výdaje idú na spoluprácu s výtvarní?kou. Designérka Alica Raticová nám okrem obalu albumu a grafiky navrhne aj ostatné reklamné predmety spojené s týmto projektom, ktoré nájdete v perkoch.

?AKUJEME!
SOMETHING ABOUT Mr. Pánko

My name is Julián Ratica. When I was 15, I broke my leg and I couldn´t walk for a year. During that year, music totally consumed me. I listened to old jazz LPs and learned to play my father´s guitar. Until then, I had played the piano and a promising career in a high school band had been on the horizon. Unfortunately, the recordings were not saved. :) When I could walk again, I took up the drums. Drums and percussion cast such a spell on me that my style of playing the other instruments was influenced. To complete my “One Man Band” I learned bass guitar. Over the years I performed in various bands…until I was finally anchored in marriage. Today, I play for my wife and kids. However, occasionally, I play real concerts with a band called Cosmic Days.
HOW IT ALL BEGAN
I never thought I would become a kids´ songwriter. And actually, my songs aren’t exclusively for kids. It is music, which I enjoy and the music springs from the bottom of my heart. For everyone.

From time to time, my two kids lend me their kids´ guitar. It all began during one of these jam sessions. I was strumming the guitar and Tadeáško (9 years old) said to me: “I´ve got the lyrics!” and he sang and sang…he couldn’t stop :). That´s how our first song ´Mr. Pánko´ was created… Suddenly, the song was there, out of the blue . I recorded it in the following days. I couldn´t get the melody out of my head, so I had to “set it free”. My fan base at home was thrilled and demanded more songs. This time around the impetus came from my younger son Joachym (3 years old) and ´Chimney Sweeper´ saw the light of day. Again, the desire wouldn´t let me rest – I recorded it in one night. Since then, the songs have been born one after another, and now there are many. I started to wonder where to take this project. The music I composed was more suitable for adult audience. It occurred to me I could use particular songs as samples of various genres and the project would gain something, and have different twist. My audience at home was never interested in “classic” kids´ songs and disliked the instructional lyrics of kids´ songs. I wouldn´t ever want to underestimate the music taste of kids and I hope my music can widen their horizons. You will find samples of swing, punk, reggae, bossa nova, and also songs with oriental influences on the CD.
My children helped create the lyrics of the songs: they are either made-up or they reflect real life situations from our household.:) Some lyrics are adapted from children’s folk songs.
´Coincidences do not Exist´ STUDIO

My wife is a constant surprise to me...one night she tells me we are shooting a Mr. Pánko video the next weekend. It’s true we would sometimes talk over a glass of wine about how a video would fit really nicely with this song, but I took it only as our fantasy. Suddenly, it was about to happen and I was to be the main protagonist.
Let´s take it bit by bit.
column2: >My wife, Didi, ran into her high school classmate Mišo in town, whom she hadn’t seen in years. Mišo works as a cinematographer and lives in Madrid. Mišo and Didi were wondering how to make use of the two weeks before Mišo flew back to Madrid. They considered creating something together and Didi suggested the Mr. Pánko video. Didi works as a make-up artist and I think she could’t wait to do a crazy make-up on me..:)
>We sat down together and started to imagine how the video might look. We were sure we wanted it to be
column4: > – to cover up my weak points as an actor :). Except the cinematographer, none of us had any experience with animation, but it didn´t bother us. The important thing was we liked the idea.

column1: WHAT DO WE NEED YOUR CONTRIBUTION FOR ?

Your contributions will help us to finish the album. Your early support will go directly to the cost of manufacturing and distribution of the album. You can take part in the creation of this new album through pre-ordering it. In return, my pledge to you is cool stuff, exclusive items, fun updates and, of course, early access to the music.

Further expenses will cover  the cooperation with a designer, because we want the whole visual image of the album, posters and illustration to be top-quality. Designer Alice Raticova is responsible for all the artwork - design of the booklet, illustration, web design as well as the beautiful promotional stuff which you can find in perks.
A very important part of our budget is to put together good musicians to spread Mr. Panko’s music. The gigs all around Slovakia (maybe world :)) are our priority.
The last but not least item of the budget is the web page to endorse our project.

If we exceed our goal, we would like to make another music video or publish an illustrated book related to the CD. A world full of music and engaging characters would open up before the kids’ ears and eyes.
We have 40 days to raise 3 300 USD.
Let’s make this album beautiful together. Remember, your financial support is part of the recipe for breathing life into this independent project. I can’t make it without you!
Pledge now….JUST KLICK…. and get in on some really great perks.
Together we can have fun and make it happen! I believe together we can make it happen!
OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP
Want to help but can’t donate? There are other ways you can help. Please share the campaign link and news on Facebook, Twitter and by word of mouth. Also Indiegogo has share tools to help.
Every post, every tweet, every EURO/USD really does make a difference!
THANK YOU!

NIE?O O PÁNKOVI

Volám sa Julián Ratica a hudba ma naplno opantala, ke? som si v pätnástich zlomil nohu. Rok som nemohol chodi?, po?úval som staré jazzové platne a nau?il sa hra? na otcovej starej gitare. Dovtedy som hrával iba na klavíri a rozbiehala sa mi s?ubná kariéra v stredoškolskej kapele. Žia?, nahrávky sa už nezachovali :) Ke? som  rozchodil tú nohu, sadol som si za bicie. Bicie a perkusie mi u?arovali nato?ko, že ovplynili aj štýl môjho hrania na ostatné nástroje. Aby bola moja “ONE MAN BAND” kompletná, tak som sa ešte dou?il hra? na basu. Postupne som vystriedal viaceré kapely..až som zakotvil v manželstve. Teraz hrávam hlavne doma de?om a manželke, ale predsa len ob?as aj ""naozajstne"" koncertujem s mojou srdcovou kapelou COSMIC DAYS.
AKO TO VŠETKO ZA?ALO

Nikdy som nemal predstavu, že sa stanem detským pesni?károm. Vlastne by bolo vhodné poveda?, že by to ani nemali by? výhradne typické detské pesni?ky. Je to hudba, ktorú robím rád a zo srdca :) Pre všetkých.

Moje dve deti mi ob?as poži?ajú svoju detskú gitarku. No a práve pri takejto domácej jam session to celé za?alo - len tak si brnkám , a Tadeáško (9r.) mi hovorí: “mám text!” a už spieva..ide a nezastaví sa :) Tak vznikla naša prvá spolo?ná pesni?ka Pánko. Zrazu tu bola a ani neviem ako. Hne? na druhý de? som ju šiel nahra?. Nevedel som tú melódiu pusti? z hlavy, tak som ju musel vypusti? von. Moji domáci fanúšikovia boli nadšení a nevedeli sa do?ka? ?alšej pesni?ky. Tentokrát na podnet mladšieho Joachymka (3r.) vznikol Kominár. Tiež mi tento motív nedal pokoj, nahral som ho za jednu noc. No a odvtedy sa pesni?ky už len rodili a množili. Za?al som teda rozmýš?a? ako uchopi? tento „projekt“. Hudbu do týchto piesní som skladal ako pre dospelé publikum, tak mi napadlo, že by som mohol využi? konkrétne piesne ako ukážky rôznych hudobných žánrov a vnies? do projektu iný rozmer. Mojich domácich posluchá?ov nikdy nezaujímali detské odrhova?ky a už vôbec nie pou?né texty detských piesní. Nechcem podce?ova? vkus detí a týmto by som rád prispel k rozšíreniu ich hudobných obzorov. Na albume nájdete ukážky swingu, punku, reagge, bosanovy ale aj skladby inšpirované orientálnymi vplyvmi…
Na textoch piesní sa podie?ali aj moje deti, sú bu? vymyslené, alebo reflektujú skuto?né udalosti z našej domácnosti.:)  Niektoré texty sú prevzaté z detských ?udových piesní. .
Štúdio  NÁHODA NEEXISTUJE

Moja manželka je samé prekvapenie…a tak mi raz ve?er oznámila, že budúci víkend to?íme klip k Pánkovi. Je pravda, že sme sa ob?as pri pohári vína rozprávali, že by sa k tejto pesni?ke hodil animovaný klip…ale bral som to iba ako našu fantáziu. Zrazu sa to ale malo udia? a ja som mal by? hlavný protagonista.

No, ale aby som šiel po poriadku. Moja manželka - Didi - sa totiž v meste náhodou po rokoch stretla so svojim spolužiakom Mišom zo  strednej školy, ktorý je dnes kameramanom a žije v Madride. Rozmýš?ali o tom, že by mali využi? 2 týždne, kým sa zas Michal vráti spä? do Madridu a nie?o spolu vytvori?..tak Didi navrhla urobi? klip k pesni?ke Pánko. Didi je maskérka, a tak si myslím, že sa hlavne tešila ako ma zma?uje :).

Tak sme si spolu sadli a za?ali vymýš?ali scénar ku klipu - to, že bude animovaný bolo isté - potrebovali sme zakry? moje herecké nedostatky :). Okrem kameramana nikto z nás nemal skúsenosti s animáciou, ale to nikoho netrápilo. Podstatné pre nás bolo, že sa nám nápad pá?i. Náš “Pánko team”, ktorý ma „animoval“ to robil s neuverite?ným nasadením a o tri natá?acie dni sme boli v cieli.  Všetko sa zomlelo tak rýchlo a pekne do seba zapadalo, že to nemohla by? náhoda - a preto : ""Štúdio Náhoda neexistuje"".:P
Nedá mi tu nespomenú? pracovitý “pánko team” - Mišo, Lea, Didi, Wá?a a Ja :) - ?akujem vám :)

It’s true we would sometimes talk over a glass of wine about how a video would fit really nicely with this song, but I took it only as our fantasy. Suddenly, it was about to happen and I was to be the main protagonist.

Let´s take it bit by bit. My wife, Didi, ran into her high school classmate Mišo in town, whom she hadn’t seen in years. Mišo works as a cinematographer and lives in Madrid. Mišo and Didi were wondering how to make use of the two weeks before Mišo flew back to Madrid. They considered creating something together and Didi suggested the Mr. Pánko video. Didi works as a make-up artist and I think she could’t wait to do a crazy make-up on me..:)

We sat down together and started to imagine how the video might look. We were sure we wanted it to be animated – to cover up my weak points as an actor :). Except the cinematographer, none of us had any experience with animation, but it didn´t bother us. The important thing was we liked the idea.

Our “Mr. Pánko team”, which was in charge of the animation, did their job with tremendous vigor and energy - we crossed the finish line three days later. Everything occurred so quickly and fit together so well that it couldn´t have been a coincidence. That is why ´Coincidences Do not Exist´. :P I shouldn’t forget to thank our hard-working Mr. Pánko Team – Mišo, Lea, Didi, Wá?a and me. Thanks tons!

column2: >(Pour la version francaise, merci de descendre en bas de la page!)

>My name is Nancy Danino, I’m an Israeli-French singer songwriter and 7 years ago, I moved to New York City to pursue my dream of recording an album, building my band and performing in this city that I love so much. I worked really hard, and today this album is ready! I did everything I could by myself, but I'm here today because I need your support to release and promote it. Thank you so much for taking 4mns of your time to watch the video I prepared to introduce myself to you in the most simple and sincere way
column3: discover my journey from Paris to New York!
column4:
)

So here's a little bit of my story...

column2: >Before I moved here, I was very comfortable...I was signed at BMG Music Publishing, I was working with a great team and I collaborated with amazing artists all round Europe, but I just couldn't figure out my next level.
>I had the chance to meet Anders Hansson who’s a very talented producer in Sweden, and together we started these intense and powerful songwriting sessions
column3: It was one of the most amazing times of my life. So when the US office of BMG Music Publishing listened to the songs and invited me to NY, I couldn't resist... I knew I had to go. And this is when
column4: >the real fight started for me

column2: >I dived in a world I thought I knew so well
column3: I know, love, and understand music, but I realized I didn’t have any knowledge of the business really. It was evolving and changing so fast! It was scary sometimes, heartbreaking and frustrating too, but I never looked back. Today I understand how this journey was valuable. I learned so much along the way. The album is recorded, produced, ready...if you watch the video you will probably understand my journey a little more
column4: ) I actually named it Testify because
column6: >I desire to be a witness that if you pursue your dreams with certainty and tenacity,

column2: >In January 2013, I met and partnered with a wonderful young woman named Christina Weber. She jumped on board with me and decided to make this mission hers. Together we started to branch out to industry people with the goal to build the same kind of strong team I had in Europe. The feedback has been amazing and today we're about to release the album worldwide with a great company!!! What does it mean? That it will be out soon, BUT I STILL NEED TO PROMOTE THE RELEASE OF THE ALBUM OTHERWISE NOBODY WILL KNOW THAT IT EXISTS!
> So now that I financed everything I could by myself, now that the album is about to come out, I really need your help today! I know the time has come and this is a real opportunity!

column4: >To hire a publicist and a marketing company to promote the album
>To hire a booking agent, produce more shows and perform close to you, in Europe and US

column2: >We’ll continue reaching out to companies, but the goal is to make enough noise to get the attention of more great partners, so we can move to the next level and see the fruits of our labor!
>Some of you have been so supportive coming to the shows
column3: you all need to know how grateful I am.
column4: > Some of you I know were a little far away, but you sent me so much love and you never wanted me to give up! Any financial contribution you can send will be greatly appreciated and put to brilliant use!
column5: >I can’t tell you how excited I am to do this…it’s not an easy thing to ask for help, but once you understand how connected we all are, you understand the beauty of feeling encouraged and supported. This is to me a beautiful proactive way to move forward in my career, and to do everything I can to fulfill my purpose in this life.

column1: <strong><span lang=""FR"" style=""font-size: 10pt
<h1><span lang=""FR"" style=""font-size: 10.0pt
column3: >Mon nom est Nancy Danino, je suis auteur-compositeur-interprète, et il y a 7 ans, je suis venue vivre a NY pour vivre mon rêve. Je suis venue pour enregistrer mon album solo, monter mon groupe et jouer sur scene dans cette ville qui m'a toujours fascinee. J'ai travaille dur et surmonte beaucoup de challenges, mais je l'ai fais! J'ai enregistre et produit mon nouvel album, et j'ai maintenant besoin de votre aide pour le sortir et le promouvoir.

column1: <h1><span lang=""FR"" style=""font-size: 10.0pt
column3: >Merci de prendre 4 petites minutes pour regarder la video que j'ai prepare afin de vous presenter en toute sincerite mon univers et mon projet!

column1: <h1><span lang=""FR"" style=""font-size: 10.0pt
column3: >Petit historique...Juste avant de m'installer a NY, j’ai eu la chance de rencontrer en Suede un producteur exceptionnel appelé Anders Hansson, et ensemble nous avons commencé ces intenses séances d’écriture
column4: Ce fut une des périodes les plus incroyables de ma vie. J’ai découvert qui j’étais et ce que j’étais capable d’exprimer et de créer dans un environnement ou je me sentais comprise et encouragée. Ensemble nous avons choisi 8 de ces titres pour l’album Testify.

column3: >Lorsque le bureau de BMG Publishing New Yorkais m'a invité a venir, j’ai senti le besoin de prendre ce risque afin de pouvoir avancer. C’était tout ce dont je rêvais. column1: <h1><span lang=""FR"" style=""font-size: 10.0pt
column3: >Je me suis plongée dans un monde que je pensais connaître si bien. Je me suis rendue compte a quel point je n’étais pas éduquée sur le business proprement dit, puisque je n’avais jamais enregistré un album sans qu’il ne soit signé auparavant par un label. De plus, l’industrie du disque évolue et change si vite… Inutile de préciser à quel point ce fut éprouvant, frustrant et même effrayant parfois, mais je n’ai jamais regardé en arrière. Aujourd’hui je comprends à quel point cette aventure fut un apprentissage exceptionnel et je ne regrette rien. J’ai d’ailleurs appelle l’album TESTIFY (Témoignage) car j’aimerais vraiment au final, pouvoir inspirer tous ceux qui ont un rêve, a s’associer avec des personnes de valeur et travailler dur sans jamais renoncer.

column1: <h1><span lang=""FR"" style=""font-size: 10.0pt
column3: >Cette annee me suis associée avec une personne formidable appelée Christina Weber. Elle est montée a bord et a fait de ma mission la sienne. Ensemble nous avons commencé à contacter des gens de l’industrie du disque avec comme objectif de créer une équipe solide. Je suis ravie de pouvoir annoncer que nous avons DECROCHE UNE SUPER DISTRIBUTION ICI ET QUE L'ALBUM VA BIENTOT SORTIR PARTOUT DANS LE MONDE!!!

>Qu'est-ce que cela signifie? Que l'album va bientot etre disponible partout, mais que nous devons encore nous occuper de la promotion. C'est une opportunite extraordinaire de collaborer avec des gens de ce niveau, mais je dois faire mes preuves et PROMOUVOIR LA SORTIE DE L'ALBUM MOI MEME SINON PERSONNE NE SAURA QU'IL EST DISPONIBLE!!!

column1: ","Hello dear friends,
(Pour la version francaise, merci de descendre en bas de la page!)

My name is Nancy Danino, I’m an Israeli-French singer songwriter and 7 years ago, I moved to New York City to pursue my dream of recording an album, building my band and performing in this city that I love so much. I worked really hard, and today this album is ready! I did everything I could by myself, but I'm here today because I need your support to release and promote it. Thank you so much for taking 4mns of your time to watch the video I prepared to introduce myself to you in the most simple and sincere way
column2: discover my journey from Paris to New York!
column3: )So here's a little bit of my story...

column1: Before I moved here, I was very comfortable...I was signed at BMG Music Publishing, I was working with a great team and I collaborated with amazing artists all round Europe, but I just couldn't figure out my next level.
I had the chance to meet Anders Hansson who’s a very talented producer in Sweden, and together we started these intense and powerful songwriting sessions
column2: It was one of the most amazing times of my life. So when the US office of BMG Music Publishing listened to the songs and invited me to NY, I couldn't resist... I knew I had to go. And this is when the real fight started for me!

column1: I dived in a world I thought I knew so well
column2: I know, love, and understand music, but I realized I didn’t have any knowledge of the business really. It was evolving and changing so fast! It was scary sometimes, heartbreaking and frustrating too, but I never looked back. Today I understand how this journey was valuable. I learned so much along the way. The album is recorded, produced, ready...if you watch the video you will probably understand my journey a little more
column3: ) I actually named it Testify because I desire to be a witness that if you pursue your dreams with certainty and tenacity, anything can happen!

column1: In January 2013, I met and partnered with a wonderful young woman named Christina Weber. She jumped on board with me and decided to make this mission hers. Together we started to branch out to industry people with the goal to build the same kind of strong team I had in Europe. The feedback has been amazing and today we're about to release the album worldwide with a great company!!! What does it mean? That it will be out soon, BUT I STILL NEED TO PROMOTE THE RELEASE OF THE ALBUM OTHERWISE NOBODY WILL KNOW THAT IT EXISTS!
So now that I financed everything I could by myself, now that the album is about to come out, I really need your help today! I know the time has come and this is a real opportunity!
-          To hire a publicist and a marketing company to promote the album
-          To hire a booking agent, produce more shows and perform close to you, in Europe and US
-          To shoot a couple of videos
We’ll continue reaching out to companies, but the goal is to make enough noise to get the attention of more great partners, so we can move to the next level and see the fruits of our labor!
Some of you have been so supportive coming to the shows
column2: you all need to know how grateful I am. Some of you I know were a little far away, but you sent me so much love and you never wanted me to give up! Any financial contribution you can send will be greatly appreciated and put to brilliant use!I can’t tell you how excited I am to do this…it’s not an easy thing to ask for help, but once you understand how connected we all are, you understand the beauty of feeling encouraged and supported. This is to me a beautiful proactive way to move forward in my career, and to do everything I can to fulfill my purpose in this life.

column1: Bonjour a tous,

Mon nom est Nancy Danino, je suis auteur-compositeur-interprète, et il y a 7 ans, je suis venue vivre a NY pour vivre mon rêve. Je suis venue pour enregistrer mon album solo, monter mon groupe et jouer sur scene dans cette ville qui m'a toujours fascinee. J'ai travaille dur et surmonte beaucoup de challenges, mais je l'ai fais! J'ai enregistre et produit mon nouvel album, et j'ai maintenant besoin de votre aide pour le sortir et le promouvoir.
Merci de prendre 4 petites minutes pour regarder la video que j'ai prepare afin de vous presenter en toute sincerite mon univers et mon projet!

Petit historique...Juste avant de m'installer a NY, j’ai eu la chance de rencontrer en Suede un producteur exceptionnel appelé Anders Hansson, et ensemble nous avons commencé ces intenses séances d’écriture
column2: Ce fut une des périodes les plus incroyables de ma vie. J’ai découvert qui j’étais et ce que j’étais capable d’exprimer et de créer dans un environnement ou je me sentais comprise et encouragée. Ensemble nous avons choisi 8 de ces titres pour l’album Testify.

column1: Lorsque le bureau de BMG Publishing New Yorkais m'a invité a venir, j’ai senti le besoin de prendre ce risque afin de pouvoir avancer. C’était tout ce dont je rêvais. En moins de 2 mois, j’ai dis au revoir a mes partenaires professionels, mes amis et ma famille, et je suis partie en laissant tout le monde derrière moi, totalement ébahis par ma décision.
C’est la que le combat a véritablement commencé pour moi.

Je me suis plongée dans un monde que je pensais connaître si bien. Je me suis rendue compte a quel point je n’étais pas éduquée sur le business proprement dit, puisque je n’avais jamais enregistré un album sans qu’il ne soit signé auparavant par un label. De plus, l’industrie du disque évolue et change si vite… Inutile de préciser à quel point ce fut éprouvant, frustrant et même effrayant parfois, mais je n’ai jamais regardé en arrière. Aujourd’hui je comprends à quel point cette aventure fut un apprentissage exceptionnel et je ne regrette rien. J’ai d’ailleurs appelle l’album TESTIFY (Témoignage) car j’aimerais vraiment au final, pouvoir inspirer tous ceux qui ont un rêve, a s’associer avec des personnes de valeur et travailler dur sans jamais renoncer.

Cette annee me suis associée avec une personne formidable appelée Christina Weber. Elle est montée a bord et a fait de ma mission la sienne. Ensemble nous avons commencé à contacter des gens de l’industrie du disque avec comme objectif de créer une équipe solide. Je suis ravie de pouvoir annoncer que nous avons DECROCHE UNE SUPER DISTRIBUTION ICI ET QUE L'ALBUM VA BIENTOT SORTIR PARTOUT DANS LE MONDE!!!

Qu'est-ce que cela signifie? Que l'album va bientot etre disponible partout, mais que nous devons encore nous occuper de la promotion. C'est une opportunite extraordinaire de collaborer avec des gens de ce niveau, mais je dois faire mes preuves et PROMOUVOIR LA SORTIE DE L'ALBUM MOI MEME SINON PERSONNE NE SAURA QU'IL EST DISPONIBLE!!!
Alors maintenant que j’ai financé tout ce que j’ai pu seule, j’ai vraiment besoin de votre aide pour creer des miracles !
-          Pour engager un RP et une équipe marketing afin de promouvoir l’album.
-          Pour engager un booker, produire plus de shows et venir jouer près de chez vous.
-          Pour filmer un ou deux clips vidéo.

Nous allons continuer a grandir de manière organique, tout en établissant des collaborations, mais notre but est bien sur de continuer a trouver des partenaires motivés et de récolter enfin les fruits de mon labeur!
Certains d’entre vous ont été si encourageants et si présents lors de mon parcours New Yorkais. Vous ne pouvez pas imaginer a quel point je vous en suis reconnaissante.
Certains d’entre vous je le sais, sont loins, mais si présents par la pensée
column2: je sais a quel point vous aimeriez me voir réussir. La moindre collaboration financière que nous recevrons sera utilisée de manière brillante je vous le garantie !

column1: INCENTIVES/OBJECTIFS
Indiegogo Goal: $15,000

This Indiegogo campaign is in an effort to raise $15,000 to put towards the release of my new album entitled 'Testify'. 'Testify' is a 12 songs Album that I plan to release this summer 2013. It’s been a long process and I am so excited for it to finally be released out into the world!
The Ultimate Goal/L'Objectif Ultime: $40,000

Now that I managed to finance the complete mastering and packaging of the album, it’s time to bring it out to the public. That means paying for marketing, distribution, publicity, artwork, photographs, touring, etc. Our current budget says on the leaner side that we need around $40,000 to do all of that.
OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP: SHARE!

If you want to be involved and show your support, but simply don’t have the extra finances to do so, there are other ways you can help out! SPREAD THE WORD! Share with your family and friends, post the page on Facebook, Tweet, blog, email, Instagram…thanks to your enthusiasm you might be able to reach people I would never be able to reach on my own!
ANGEL INVESTOR/INVESTISSEURS

If you or someone you know understand my vision and would love to be part of it in a professional way and become an ANGEL INVERSTOR, then it would be fantastic too. Please talk to us at a info@nancydanino.com. Si vous aimez mon projet et si vous avez envie d'en faire partie de maniere professionelle en devenant un investisseur, n'hesitez pas a nous contacter, nous serions ravie d'en discuter avec vous!
Thank you, I appreciate all of you sincerely.

10% of what I will receive during this Campaign will go to one of my favorite organization, “Spirituality for Kids”. Their aim is for children to have a spiritual understanding of themselves, their connection to others and the world, and to tap into their inner strengths, realizing that the power to overcome any challenge lies within them! For more information about the organization and program, go to www.spiritualityforkids.com.",5.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","New York, United States",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/help-nancy-danino-release-and-promote-her-new-album-testify/pica

     Us Lights is a hard working group of musicians with a clear
goal and a dedicated path to achieving that goal.  We carefully track and save all of the money we earn playing
live and directly invest it back into the band’s future.  Our main goal is finishing our debut

album by August 1st of 2014 followed by extensive touring.
 

     Sometimes with hard work and dedication things happen a
little bit faster than planned.
That being said, we have signed on to tour Europe from September 1<sup>st</sup>
through October 4<sup>th</sup> of 2014, which is a touch ahead of what

we had planned.

     Our debut album will be recorded by an experienced and professional
team of engineers including Victor Nash (tracking), Tony Lash (mixing), and
Jeff Stuart Saltzman (mastering).
Our base goal of $4500 will see Us Lights complete our debut album and
any additional funds raised will supplement the cost of travel as we tour

Europe later this year.  

     Please feel free to share our fund raising campaign with friends and family via the Indie Go Go Share Tools loacted above!


* Us Lights campaign video filmed and edited by Hoyt Boyd.  Narration written and performed by Mat Probasco.

The Penn Glee Club needs your help to continue its longstanding tradition of performing its music around the world. This year, our tour destinations include Austria, Germany, and the Czech Republic. Getting our singers, band, and tech staff to these amazing destinations will be no small feat. While we do our best to plan an exciting yet affordable tour, each member still has to bear much of the burden individually. 

We view our tour as a way to share our music with diverse audiences as well as a time for Glee Club members to form even stronger bonds. For this reason, we aim to ensure that every member can come on tour, regardless of their financial situation. With help from donors like you we can make this a reality! In addition to the rewards listed, donors of $500 and above will be recognized in our tour programs and will receive personalized postcards from Glee Club members while on tour.

Note: Donations through Indiegogo via credit card or PayPal are not tax deductible. If you would like more information about making a tax deductible donation to the Glee Club, feel free to email business@penngleeclub.com

Foreshadow, a musical group that blends the core genres of death metal, black metal, old school thrash metal, to create their own, unique sound, has begun to deliver a plethora of lyrical and melodic genius to the world. Foretelling the turn of this generations appreciation of raw music and solid performances. Reigning from their infamous hometown of Tampa, Florida. Foreshadow uses their vocal and instrumental influences to comment heavily upon the lies that have enveloped as truth amongst the general population. Influenced by such artists who include Slayer, Lamb of God, Nile, and Pantera.  Band members, Daniel ""Corkscrew"" McConaghy (vocalist), Aaron Robinson (guitarist), Kraken Kelly (drummer), and Chris Billingsly (bassist), have been united under Foreshadow umbrella since January of 2008.
Individually and collectively, alike, the band is extremely familiar to stage performance. Having just completed a headlining South American tour. They have also opened for international death metal band Dying Fetus, as well as playing Fall Fest in Miami, Florida, The 11th Annual Deland Music Festival, and Kaos Fest III. Foreshadow also released their music video in April 2012 for their first single, ""The Meaning of Life"". Which has become a underground metal hit.
Foreshadow
is looking to raise $5,000.00 to record out third album tentatively titled “Ashes
of Forgotten Gods.”  The $5,000.00 would
cover our cost for studio time and the producer's fee.  We have just signed a great distribution and
marketing deal with Blackstream Records/Universal Music Group
(www.blackstreamrecords.com).  We got a
lot of great gifts and perks for your contributions, everything from cds and
t-shirts to a private concert with an auto<span style=""letter-spacing: 0.06em
column2: >graphed guitar.  If we happen to fall short of our goal, the funds contributed will go towards our $5,000.00 budget to record in June.

In my
lifetime I have been lucky enough to experience many different cultures,
customs and ways of life. I have lived abroad for most of my life
in Poland, grew up in Canada and currently reside in The
Netherlands. These international experiences made me feel comfortable in
different environments, helped me not to see boundaries and always keep an open
mind. All this has influenced and can be heard in my music. Although I am
classically schooled and studied Jazz for many years I have always been open to
all music. Blues, Funk, Hip-Hop, Rock and Pop have always been on heavy
rotation on my iPod and have all left an equal mark on my musical personality. The
colorful fusion of the different genres is the essence of the Wojtek Justyna Tree… Oh!? album “Definitely
Something”  that is meant to take the listener on a musical journey.
For this
record I decided to invite some of the finest musicians I know to join the Wojtek Justyna Tree… Oh!? and add their
personalities to the music. Legendary funk drummer Jamal Thomas (USA) showcases
the deepest Funk groove, saxophone colossus Frank Deruytter (BE) delivers a
fury of Jazz lines, singer Michael “Big Mike” Ventimiglia (USA) supplies the
essence of Blues, Coen Molenaar (NL) adds greasy organ grinding, Dela Botri
(GH) and Mame Balla (SE) bring the roots of African music, and vocalist Poliana
Vieira (PT) gives a taste of modern Soul. It was a true blessing to have these
artists collaborate on this album and give the music another dimension.
In the past
year I have invested around 7000 euro into the preparation, recording, mixing
and mastering of the album. Unfortunately I am not able to finance the final
stages of production of the CD myself and kindly ask for your support to bring
the album out.
The sum
that I need to raise will cover:
-
album
artwork
-
production
of the CD
-
distribution
-
promotion

of the album

To express
my gratitude for your donations I want to give you something personal in
return: a signed CD, you’re name printed inside of the cover or a one on one

music lesson with me are all meant to express my personal thanks to you.

All
donators will receive the album exclusively before Christmas (making the music
a wonderful gift)  before the official release in 2015.
A great big
thank you goes out to all the musicians, engineers and friends who have worked
with me on this CD. The music is ready to see the light of day and it sounds absolutely
wonderful thanks to you!
With the success
of this campaign I will be able to share my album with music lovers out there.

Can’t wait for you to hear it!

Please visit www.wojtekjustyna.com for more music and info.
Thank you
for you support!

Wojtek

P.S. Sharing this campaign with friends, family and music lovers is a big help as well! Thnx, W.

column1: ","Who are the SCURVY KIDS?Scurvy Kids are a Los Angeles based Punk Rock band that has been playing in one form or another since 2007.After numerous line-up changes and pretty much a complete break-up in 2011, singer and founding member Ben Anguiano put together the current solid line-up, Nicole Vigueria (Bass), Eric Gonzalez (Guitar), Jacob Ramsey (Drums) & Brandon Jatico (Guitar), Shows supporting punk rock legends such as the Misfits, Fear, Agent Orange, D.I., The Dickies, Michale Graves, Unwritten Law, Duane Peters and many more have put this young band (oldest member 20, youngest 15) to the test many times! They always walk off the stage having more fans then they did 30 minutes earlier!The band has lived by the D.I.Y. code that their punk forefathers wrote decades ago! They book their own shows, throw their own shows, print their own merch, build their own stage props, and put up numerous touring bands as they pass thru the Los Angeles area.Now they need your help! This will be our first time venturing into the world of Indiegogo. We decided long ago that we would not be the band that asked over and over again to buy us groceries, help us get our dog spayed, get our patches printed, etc... We wanted to save this for something BIG and we feel that our CD is that!Help finance their debut CD by purchasing one of the cool perks you see listed here.
Our Goal: $3,000This will cover the tracking, mixing, mastering, printing & packaging of the 10 song disc.
What You Get:
Pins
Shirts
Hoodies
Bundle Packs
Your name in the liner notes
Lunch with the Scurvy Kids!
A SCURVY KIDS show for you and your friends
and more!!!

You’ll see a much more detailed rundown of our perks in the right column! If you see something you're interested in act quick, you never know how long that perk will be available. We hope that you like what we have to offer!

The Impact:Show after show we are asked ""Where can I get your CD?"" This gives us a chance to grow as musicians and as a band! Even though we are young, we are all dedicated to our band and to our craft. We have built a great following throughout our time as a band and we truly appreciate all those who have stood by us. We realize that no matter who the band is, we are NOTHING WITHOUT YOU!Every contribution counts!No contribution is too small. Every dollar makes a huge difference.Thank you in advance!Please share this page with your friends!SEE YOU IN THE PIT!",0.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","Los Angeles, United States",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/help-fund-the-scurvy-kids-debut-cd/pica

column2: >80 TONS FANS! Not sure you realize it, but this is the song YOU GUYS helped write! We used YOUR lyrics, YOUR suggestions, even YOUR title! We hope YOU will help us record it. If you can give any amount, it would be appreciated. If you can't give, but could help spread the word among fellow music-lovers and dream-supporters who CAN give, we would be grateful. We want to make this album for YOU. Please help us reach our goal.

column1:
• 80 Tons of Mercury is a little Alt Rock band from Michigan.
  • We believe in our music, and we want to continue to create more.
  • Making music is what keeps us all going - it's our passion.
What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

This is what we are setting out to do:

  • We are trying to raise $1,000 to aid our next music project.
  • Our mission is to record and package an EP disc.
  • Money will help pay for recording, mastering, packaging, and distribution.

The Impact

In concept, this EP will include a new 80 Tons song ""Gold"" and a few other tracks.

  • Keeping rock alive is what we are trying to do, and we don't want to stop.
  • We previously funded and recorded a digital release of our first album OMINA that can be found on SoudCloud, ReverbNation, and our FB page.
  • This time we are asking for fans help to reach our next goal.

Risks &
column3:
Challenges

Money and time are the enemy, and we want to produce a memorable music experience with your help. 

  • Together, this band has overcome personal downfalls, house fires, and medical conditions - but we keep rocking.
  • It's when we unite that we feel the strength of our music and passion for creativity.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't help with a donation, we understand, but you can help spread the word and share this creative fundraising campaign. 

  • Get the word out and make some noise about this 80 Tons campaign ""Going for Gold"".
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to help us along!

column2:
>I have been a musician and entertainer for over 40 years.. 

so It's about time I recorded a solo project! I have worked as a Karaoke Jockey for the last 7 years, in my own business and been blessed to know many 'unsung', remarkably talented singers. In my many years as a musician- I have known many with powerful gifts to share, that deserve a break
column3: a break that is not coming from the industry as we know it.. so the first of my 3 planned solo recordings, starting with ""This..""
column5: >are being released on my new Indie label (which I am not sharing the name of here until all of the legalities are ironed out), but you can rest assured that if you like what you hear in my solo work?
column6:
>You ain't heard nothin' yet.. 

 The roster of talent already lining up to be part of this recording project and future ones will blow your mind.. This is YOUR chance to be a part of bringing a 21st century Motown to life! We kept the rewards list short and sweet to get started quickly, but rest assured that if you are a dedicated partner to this and future ventures, you will be well taken care of.. the rewards we will offer will only grow as this blossoming new label does!

""This.."", the CD, is very nearly out of production already.. so it's almost all about 'dotting I's and crossing T's' at this point
column7:
the typical laundry list of copyrighting, publishing, distribution, performing rights societies, as well as booking and management to support touring.. (Yes, there will be a tour). 

Needless to say, anybody that has ever had to deal with 'red tape' knows how daunting and difficult these things can be (The Library of Congress.. need I say more?).. but I am confident that I have all of the necessary machinery in place, ready to 'make it all happen' with full funding. You can count on me to keep you aware of any snags that may hold up your reward
column8: but you can be sure that any hold up's that may arise will be minor, and will in no genuine way, be problematic. I am grateful that the collaborators at large (that's YOU!) understand that ""This.."" is a work in progress, and that setbacks can arise
column9: but if they should- You can trust me to beat 'em back with a stick and make it happen anyway. If you are a higher level contributor, your partnership has no expiration with me.. and you will always have my gratitude.
column10: >Finally, Thank You for taking the time out of your day to look and listen- Big, big things happen when positive people join together for a common goal.
column11:
>Thank You!  =D

Namaste.

Short Summary

When the South Side puts their head and their heart into something you know it's going to be golden.  In this case, it's lyrical genius.  

""No, I dont want your error"" and ""No, I dont want none of your kind"" are just two of the heart pulling lines to look forward to if this ""No Bugs"" music video gets launched by the hot new band TFS.

[Play the Sarah Mclaughlin music] There's only one problem - they can't do this without your help.  Please, take our your wallet, pull out your credit card, and enter those sweet digits into this campaign, because really.. they're doing you a favor.  With every dollar donated the cast of ""No Bugs"" will feed a starving QA tester, and hopefully bring an end to this tragic bug infestation. *the cast makes no such claim of feeding starving QA testers.

What We Need &
<li>We need a random amount of money that will be un-tracked and maybe not entirely used for this purpose.  A hundred and fifty dollars sounds about right, which is only about $5 per person. &lt

The Impact

NO MORE BUGS!  And hopefully a pretty awesome video from some of our office friends.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate because you lost your wallet at the bar...again, or you can't donate because you fell into a pool in vegas and all of your money was washed away, or you can't donate because you converted all of your money into Vegas chips and then forgot to cash out, or you can't donate because your Phoenix tab is just too high, please - SPREAD THE WORD! 

And that’s all there is to it.

YOU DID IT! WE DID IT GUYS!!!! WE REACHED MY CAMPAIGN GOAL WITH 1 HOUR TO SPARE.  YOU ARE THE MOST AMAZING FANS EVER. THIS IS CRAZY!  I know this is a tough time of year to come up with ANY extra cash…trust me, I sure do get it. Knowing that you all believe in my dream enough to trust me with your hard earned dollars is truly humbling, and the best Christmas present an artist could ask for.  THANK YOU FOR BELIEVING IN ME!  The future just got a whole lot brighter. I can't wait get to work and SHOW you how right you are about me!  Thank you Santa and all you little helpers of his :)  Never stop believing in people...and most importantly, never stop believing in yourself.  Ever.
Happy Holidays friends!  Now let me get to work on these perks of yours…
Love,
Jordan

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ 

I am down to the final hours and so SO close to reaching this goal before 11:59PM TONIGHT.  You've gotten me this far….too far to quit now!  Since it's Christmas Eve, here is a special message from Santa himself.
I believe in Christmas miracles :)

column2: navCatId=25504"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">The Next Chapter is Taking Me to Nashville: In case you missed my interview and performance on
column3: navCatId=25504"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">My News 3 - NBC Las Vegas yesterday, the plan you are helping fund here is now taking me to Nashville, TN!  I am SO excited to share this news with you guys.  I will finish the current song we are working on here and resume the ""plan"" below in Tennessee.  With such wonderful people here in Las Vegas, and also in Nashville who believe in me and want to help build my career it was a tough decision to make, but I feel strongly that Nashville is where I need to be right now.  Its ready with open arms and I am answering the call.   Las Vegas has and will always be my home.  It is the community that has shaped me and built me up.  It is where my family lives.  I will be back

column1: <div>

With only 6 days to go, especially with the big move ahead, I need your help reaching my goal now more than ever!  We are 59% of the way there, with $3,514 to go.  ANYTHING you can contribute will help and don't forget you can suggest your own perks if you like.  Please help me reach this goal by Christmas Eve friends!  I want to give my hometown one more success story they can point to and be proud of as one of their own.  Help me get there and watch me SHINE!

~ 12 DAYS OF CHRISTMAS ~

Wow we are getting closer and closer to reaching the minimum goal guys!  Thank you SO MUCH for all your support, promotion, and contributions thus far.  For the last twelve days of the campaign, I'm counting down the ""12 Days Of Christmas"" with 12 special perks for my backers.  No matter what holiday(s) you're celebrating, count down with me EACH DAY while laughing at these silly instagram videos I'll be posting with fans, friends, and random people I persuade to count down the twelve perks I have created for you guys.  *Remember, if you have a special request or suggestion for another ""perk,"" I am all ears!*  Maybe, just maybe, there will be a a few surprises added...  This is going to be so fun!  Please please share this campaign page with you friends and tell them how awesome I am.  I am so close.  Your support means everything to me and I canNOT do this WITHOUT YOU!

Who Is Jordan?
WEBSITE . FACEBOOK . TWITTER . MUSIC . VIDEOS . SHOWS
<span>
<blockquote>
Official Bio:  ""
column2: >Jordan Mitchell will not only drink you under the table but she'll write about it too. Her witty, yet heartfelt lyricism packs enough charm to win anybody over. It's a little bit folk, a little bit poppy and just a tad bit serious. In all honesty, she's the total package and then some! You would be a fool not to take notice.""  Born and raised in Las Vegas, Jordan naturally gravitated towards bright neon lights and entertainment. She grew up singing in the church choir where she developed her real love for music and singing. She has been influenced by artists like Patsy Cline, Ella Fitzgerald, Norah Jones, Bob Dylan, and Bonnie Raitt. Though music is Jordan's first love, she was brought up riding horses and competing in horse shows. She showed quarter horses at a very young age, and was eventually recruited by West Texas A&amp
column3: M Universitys top ranked Equestrian Team. She went on to win the 2009 Collegiate National Championship in Reining. While devoting her college career to becoming a national championship rider, she also earned a Bachelors Degree in business with a minor in musical theatre. Jordan blends country, pop and rock and sings with enough passion that will melt even the coldest of hearts. Her lyrics craft sweet with heartbreak, love with humor. It's not trying to be something its not
column4: its trying to be something it is. Real. Shes easy to love and hard to forget.""

column1: I have been singing since I was a little girl when I found it was the best way to annoy my little
brother.  I wouldn’t shut up so my
parents finally decided to put me in singing lessons to ease their ears a bit.  From there I started performing at every contest,
talent show, county fair, and community event I could, and I haven’t stopped
since.
I released my
first EP last spring and since then its been a big year of BIG opportunities.  <span style=""letter-spacing: 0px
have been LUCKY enough to have played Austin City Limits Festival, Life is
Beautiful Festival, Wine Amplified Festival, and many others especially here in
Las Vegas like Container Park (and nearly every venue downtown), The Palms,
Vinyl at Hard Rock Hotel, Rock's Lounge at Red Rock, Brooklyn Bowl
my songs played on Las Vegas radio station, Mix 94.1.  I’ve even
played a few shows at Whole Foods and Neiman Marcus, ha.  Vegas Rated, Vegas Seven, the Las Vegas
Review Journal, and other awesome publications
column2: as well as local news media like My News 3, Fox 5, and Action News 13 have been kind enough to show me A LOT of love and support.

column1: market them effectively……it takes money.
That’s why I am doing this campaign, and that’s why I am asking for your
help.
What Are The Costs?
WEBSITE . FACEBOOK . TWITTER . MUSIC . VIDEOS . SHOWS
<div>
